title: Roasted Olives
introduction: Roasted Olives offer a delightful combination of flavors, accentuating the natural richness of the olives. The oven heat concentrates the taste, making the olives a perfect appetizer when paired with bread that can be dipped in the aromatic oil.
ingredients: 8 ounces mild black olives, such as Gaeta or Alfonso
4 ounces cured green olives, rinsed and drained
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. In a small baking pan, stir together all of the ingredients. Bake 45 minutes, stirring 2 or 3 times.
2. Transfer the olives to a bowl and serve warm.
